issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Table API should provide a schema() method
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8736](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8736). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Table API should provide a schema() method. It is currently not possible to examine the schema of a registered table without getting it via the logical schema but that isn't intuitive.
